targets.expr:
round(
  count_over_time(
    (kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"} > 0)[7d:1m]
  )
  /
  count_over_time(
    kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"}[7d:1m]
  )
  * 100,
  0.0001
)

clamp_min(
  (
    0.995 -
    (
      count_over_time((kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"} > 0)[7d:1m])
      /
      count_over_time(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"}[7d:1m])
    )
  ) / 0.005 * 50.4,
0)

clamp_min(
  (
    0.995 -
    (
      count_over_time((kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"} > 0)[$__range:1m])
      /
      count_over_time(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"}[$__range:1m])
    )
  ) / 0.005 * ($__range_s / 3600),
0)

clamp_min(
  50.4 -
  (
    (
      0.995 -
      (
        count_over_time((kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"} > 0)[7d:1m])
        /
        count_over_time(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"}[7d:1m])
      )
    ) / 0.005 * 50.4
  ),
0)

round(
  count_over_time(
    (kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"} > 0)[7d:1m]
  )
  /
  count_over_time(
    kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{namespace="otel-demo", deployment="frontend"}[7d:1m]
  )
  * 100,
  0.01
)
